metadata.name: Leopard
metadata.description:
VISIONS & MEMORIES - #1

VISIONS & MEMORIES is a poetic ode to the complexities of the human experience, rendered in the ethereal form of AI-generated portrait photography,  through the use of text-to-image technology. From the prism of a queer perspective, these artworks delve into the deepest corners of intimacy, friendship, love and healing. They offer a window into the desires that shape our lives, and the emotional connections that give them meaning.

These portraits capture not only the lived experiences of the artist and his subjects, but also the visions of the future that dance within their hearts. They invite us to gaze upon the world through the lens of possibility, to wonder at the endless permutations of the future and its infinite potential. VISIONS & MEMORIES is a tribute to the power of connection, to the beauty of diversity, and to the enduring resilience of the human soul.

VISIONS & MEMORIES is Blake Wood's first collection of AI Post-Photography work.
